manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PNY RTX A4500 Powerful Performance for Professionals The RTX A4500 delivers the power, performance, capabilities, and reliability professionals need to do more. Powered by the latest generation of RTX technology, combined with 20GB of ultra-fast GPU memory, the A4500 provides amazing performance with your favorite applications and the capability to work with larger models, renders, datasets, and scenes with higher fidelity and greater interactivity, taking your work to the next level. With the introduction of the Ampere architecture, the next generation of RTX became available to millions of professionals. Featuring enhanced real-time ray tracing, accelerated AI, and advanced graphics and compute capabilities, the Ampere architecture enables artists, designers, engineers, and scientists to create tomorrow, today.
What's in the box PNY Quadro RTX A4500 Graphics Card DisplayPort to DVI-D SL adapter Dual 6-pin PCIe to 8-pin power cable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT little graphics card!
reviews.reviewText: Put this in one of our workstations used for CAD. This card is unbelievably efficient and powerful for its size! It doesn't even use dedicated power, the PCIe is enough to power it. No crashes, no overheating. Just a great card. Had some minor issues with the newest Nvidia driver, but downloaded the previous driver and have had zero issues.We have a few other machines with Quadro RTX cards (5000s and 6000s) for our larger assemblies, but even this card can handle some of those larger assemblies for a fraction of the cost. The performance for smaller assemblies and parts (<1000 parts/features) is nearly identical to the Quadro RTX cards. We'll probably continue using these P2200s for future builds as our company expands since they pack a punch at a great price.SIDE NOTE: We have office game nights - Warzone, Fortnite, etc... This card is also extremely capable for those games, usually 100+ FPS on max settings for most modern titles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The fastest Adobe Premiere Pro has ever been!
reviews.reviewText: I am not a gamer and never expect that I will be, so I cannot speak to the performance of this board for that purpose, but for video editing it has been absolutely incredible. I'd never needed a graphic card before since I am mainly a still photographer but having branch out into video I discovered pretty quickly that my Dell 3640 Tower PC wasn't up to the task without help. As my first test of this card on CUDA, I a project that had previously encoded in about an hour and 15 minutes. With this card, the project exported in just over three minutes. I'll never live without one again! I'm very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent provider in bulk packaging all new
reviews.reviewText: This graphics card reduced my rendering times by a factor of 80%.Can't wait to get into VR work in my 3D models. I use AutoCAD, Sketchup and Unreal Engine.Excellent price and response of questions regarding information from Vision Computers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I've bought bulk package video cards for CAD use for the last few years and I'm surprised everytime at how the card is packaged. They work, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great Card but beware of this vendor
reviews.reviewText: The card itself is 5 star (I have several others) but I returned the one from this seller. I was expecting a new card in original packaging, but it just came with the card wrapped in some bubble wrap. There was no driver DVD etc that you usually expect to receive.If you are ok with that, then it could be fine. But it was available at a lower price from other vendors. If it was not available elsewhere, I probably would have kept it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful and Reliable
reviews.reviewText: The NVIDIA RTX A5000 is the premier high end sweet spot for content creators and workstation users in general. It provides a large amount of compute and an exceptional gaming performance for those looking for that RTX 3080 experience on a workstation. This is the only GPU you will need to do everything from creation, to work, to gaming on. I highly recommend it to creators and first time aspiring creators alike!Pros:・8192 CUDA cores over a fast 384 Bit Bus and 16GB/s of GDDR6 Memory.・Performs identically in gaming to an RTX 3080 while using 28% less power.・Renders at an incredibly fast speed through CUDA rendering applications.・Runs all the latest applications with ease and doesn't crash thanks to ECC.・It has 24GB of GDDR6 or 22.5GB ECC (Error Correcting Code) Memory.・Stays fairly cool, quiet, and doesn't expel heat into the shroud or case.・Long lasting driver support dating back to Quadro K6000.Cons:・It doesn't have a USB-C port like the older Quadro RTX series.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2021

reviews.reviewText: Very good. maybe not good for games but provide fully hardware support for realview.
